page.title: 03LESSONS AT MOELFRE SCHOOL
page.content: We have different projects e.g birds, Royal Charter, skeletons. For maths we use text books mainly. Std. 3 topics - fractions, areas, time,angles, volume, length. Fridays we have tables test, Mondays we have spelling tests. We learn English and Welsh and write in both languages. Girls learn sewing and boys craft. We have one swimming lesson weekly and gym lessons. We have two music lessons weekly, we sing and play instruments. Many play recorders and a few learn violins and guitars. This year we competed in the Urdd National Eisteddfod at Cardiff in the Creative Music section. The older children visit places of interest in the area when possible. Nicola Howard.
